text.en: In the palace of great bliss, aware and empty luminosity,
The self-arisen dharmakāya is the full strength of awareness.
text.en-trans: rangjung rigpé tsal dzok chö kyi ku

text.en: Guru and pervasive sovereign Samantabhadra, to you I pray:
Inspire me to realize the Trekchö of primordial purity.
In the palace of unceasing natural luminosity and self-radiance,
text.en-trans: rang dang gakmé rangsal zhalyé né

text.en: Is the spontaneously present sambhogakāya guru, to whom I pray:
Inspire me to complete the supreme path of four luminous visions
text.en-trans: ösal nang zhi lam chok tarchin né

text.en: And accomplish the rainbow body of great transference.
In the pure nirmāṇakāya realm of the creative power of awareness,
Is the Tulku Kunzang Pakchok Dorje,
To whom I pray with uninterrupted awareness and presence:
text.en-trans: dren rik gyünché mepé solwa deb

text.en: Inspire me to bring unlimited benefit to beings.
text.en-trans: dro dön pakmé jungwar jingyi lob

text.en: May I recognise my own awareness as the very essence of all refuges,
text.en-trans: kyab kün nyingpo rangrig lamar shé

text.en: Attain full awakening within the nature of the indestructible vajra,
text.en-trans: ku sum lhündrub zhönnu bumkü bub

text.en: The space of the youthful vase body in which the three kāyas are spontaneously present,
And empty the three realms of saṃsāra from their very depths.
text.en-trans: si sum khorwa dong né trukpar shok
